question.questiontextL:
After you finish briefing the EOC Commander, he wants to know what health effects various individuals could face based on your team’s findings about possible exposures to the Cs-137 and I-131.

Match each health effect with the individuals to whom it might apply.
question.questiontextM:
After you finish briefing the Incident Commander, he wants to know what health effects various individuals could face based on your findings about possible exposures to the Cs-137 and I-131.

Match each health effect with the individuals to whom it might apply.
question.instructionText: Select the appropriate column for each item, then click Done.

Options.Option: Burns to the eyes or skin
